entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
